channel.title: Mac Book on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in Mac Book on Reflections

item.title: Biting the "Mac" Bullet
item.description: I did it! I finally went out and bought myself a mac. I didn’t waver. No! Not this time.Ã‚ I knew exactly what I wanted, and I was going to get it, come what may! I have to confess that I have been pretty critical of Apple andits policies. I still am. Nothing has changed my opinion of Apple as a company, in particular, it’s marketing team. The ipod touch price changes lead me to those conclusions.
